_header: Who that loves or likes to hear
_description: Life of St. John Thweng of Bridlington — 239 lines

YaleBei331.First Lines:
Who þat lufes or likes to hereOf gude mens lifes þat are
                    has bene…
YaleBei331.Last Lines:
…In myndes of him oft he it kistIhesu þat þerevppon
                    was done
YaleBei331.Editions:
Amassian,  Margaret. 
             “A Verse Life of John of Bridlington.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         71 (1970): 136-45: 140.
